column5: Slick!  I thought for a minute it was 1 whole unit.
Me too,trying to figure out where the front wheels would go. Pretty cool though!!!
That's wild for sure.  Never seen anything like that.  Any guesses at the Value?

I'm pretty sure it was at the CNE boatshow way back in the late 80's, and cost around $300K back then.  Best I recollect it was a front wheel drive system same as what they use in the wheel trans buses with tag axles.
You are correct!  That chasis looks a little more recent.  Cool concept!
